abstract: General Electric will not go through with a deal to buy two Abbott Laboratories diagnostic units for $8.1 billion in cash, the two companies said Wednesday without specifying reasons, except to say that they had failed to agree on final terms and conditions.
lead_paragraph: General Electric will not go through with a deal to buy two Abbott Laboratories diagnostic units for $8.1 billion in cash, the two companies said Wednesday without specifying reasons, except to say that they had failed to agree on final terms and conditions.

headline.main: G.E. and Abbott Call Off Deal for Diagnostics Units
